explanation: [0-0] A worker wearing black trousers and black boots is standing on a cement road. The cement has not dried yet, and there are small stones underneath. The worker is holding a white tool in his hand. At the bottom of the screen, there is a caption "DOK TECH HD" with a white logo on its left.

[0-8] The worker uses the tool to level the cement on the stones. As the camera pans, a gray cement road appears on the right. The worker is also wearing a pair of black gloves. At the bottom of the screen, a white caption keeps switching back and forth.
